title: Well since, like Riot, we're buffing/nerfing for no complete reason now
body:
Can we revert Brand's Patch 8.1 buffs?

> Blaze 
> Damage per stack increased to 4% of target's maximum health from 2%.

There was honestly no reason for this. He was already pressuring & terrifying to play against as a bot laner.

I think they should buff his E personally to be more of his farming ability, while making his W more of just a way to set off his E. I miss maxing E on Brand...those were the good old days. Maybe also changing around his blaze to be a bit more skill expressive. Possibly this:

Q: Sear: Brand launches a fireball in the target direction that deals (same as live)magic damage to the first enemy it hits.
Blaze: Sear deals 50% bonus damage.

W: Pillar of Flame: After a 0.625 second delay, Brand makes the target area erupt in flames, dealing 70/90/110/130/150+60%AP magic damage to the enemies within. 
Blaze: Pillar of Flame stuns enemies in the target area for 1.5 seconds.

E: Conflagration: Brand sets the target aflame, dealing 75/120/165/210/255+35%AP magic damage.
Blaze: Conflagration also spreads to enemies around the target and deals 25% bonus damage to minions(minion damage just a possible extra in case waveclear doesn't feel as good as it should be).

Swapped the damage from W and E, as well as the passives on Q and W. The AP ratios however are the same for W and E, so W still has some merit as a damage source, and you won't just E>W>Q to stun whole teams, you'll have to actually think about how you wanna combo. You can Q>E>W to proc a massive stun, W>E>Q to do the most damage, E>W>Q to proc a stun and some nice damage with a stun on top of it as well.

Don't get me wrong, sup Brand needs a nerf, but I think the problem is in his kit and how AP works atm in general

that is the best way to fix brand though. The reason brand goes bot and not mid is because he can effectively do the same damage on a support's budget and items as a mid lane brand can. Simply bc, his ratios are garbage. 

It's important to mention that old brand did not have an ap ratio on his passive. I mean w alone is 255 base at rank 5, and 320 if you have your passive on him. THAT IS INSANE BASE DAMAGE on a rather easy to hit skillshot with a relatively low cd. 

Personally, I think that they should lower w base damage, increase the ap ratio by .2, lower passive damage base but increase ap ratio so that the typical brand mid can get more damage out of it late game than he does now, and then I would lower the mana cost on e. As well as nerfing passing tick to 3 percent instead of 4. 

 The reason brand does not do well as a mid lane mage, is largely because he just get outscaled by them or out roamed ({{champion:163}} {{champion:4}} {{champion:136}} )

If they would revert that change and instead add a small ratio or increase his existing ratios, it would help sololane brand and make his early and support less absurd.
